channel.title: Comments on: Friday Go Forward: Week 44

item.title: By: Wrapping Up 2013 | BenGoZen
item.dc:creator: Wrapping Up 2013 | BenGoZen
item.description: […] world of go or shut­ting down the go blog. I apol­o­gize for giv­ing that notion in my last Fri­day Go For­ward. So in an attempt to clar­ify what’s going on, I have decided to write […]
item.content:encoded: […] world of go or shut­ting down the go blog. I apol­o­gize for giv­ing that notion in my last Fri­day Go For­ward. So in an attempt to clar­ify what’s going on, I have decided to write […]

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks Devin! Fortunately, my disappearance shouldn't be for too long, but it seems I should go ahead and write a post about it. Haha.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Devin! Fortunately, my disappearance shouldn’t be for too long, but it seems I should go ahead and write a post about it. Haha.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I appreciate the send off! Fortunately though, I won't be going anywhere too far! Though it felt like the blog may have been going on hiatus for a while, I've been looking things over and it seems that it won't be as long as I thought. =) Thanks for your support!
item.content:encoded: I appreciate the send off! Fortunately though, I won’t be going anywhere too far! Though it felt like the blog may have been going on hiatus for a while, I’ve been looking things over and it seems that it won’t be as long as I thought. =) Thanks for your support!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Rob, Your words of kindness are appreciated in ways that I cannot even begin to describe. Fortunately though, I will not be going anywhere too far though! This hibernation should not be long and hopefully I will be able to be in a better position to provide the content everyone has come to enjoy regardless of whatever life throws at me. Once again, thanks again and no worries: I'm sure that we will see each other soon at the tournaments. =)
item.content:encoded: Rob, Your words of kindness are appreciated in ways that I cannot even begin to describe. Fortunately though, I will not be going anywhere too far though! This hibernation should not be long and hopefully I will be able to be in a better position to provide the content everyone has come to enjoy regardless of whatever life throws at me. Once again, thanks again and no worries: I’m sure that we will see each other soon at the tournaments. =)

item.title: By: Devin Flake
item.dc:creator: Devin Flake
item.description: Best of luck to you Ben - we'll look forward to your return!
item.content:encoded: Best of luck to you Ben – we’ll look forward to your return!

item.title: By: Machinato
item.dc:creator: Machinato
item.description: Ben, you have been a tremendous inspiration to me personally and although you don't know it, to a group of go players down south in Stafford, Virginia. Each time you posted game together with comments, we went through that game as a group. Your comments often cracked us up but also taught us a great deal through both those words and the games themselves. I don't believe anyone ever told you about this, but typically we went through two, "Ben's games" each month and we did it as a group of 4 to 6 people. We will certainly miss your input and encouragement. Meanwhile best of luck to you, it has been a tremendous pleasure to read your blogs and to get a glimpse of your excitement for this tremendous game and for your views about not just go but life in general. You're a great man Ben and your blog will sorely be missed. I look forward to seeing it again in the future and meanwhile wish you the very best. I'll see you at the tournaments.
item.content:encoded: Ben, you have been a tremendous inspiration to me personally and although you don’t know it, to a group of go players down south in Stafford, Virginia. Each time you posted game together with comments, we went through that game as a group. Your comments often cracked us up but also taught us a great deal through both those words and the games themselves. I don’t believe anyone ever told you about this, but typically we went through two, “Ben’s games” each month and we did it as a group of 4 to 6 people. We will certainly miss your input and encouragement. Meanwhile best of luck to you, it has been a tremendous pleasure to read your blogs and to get a glimpse of your excitement for this tremendous game and for your views about not just go but life in general. You’re a great man Ben and your blog will sorely be missed. I look forward to seeing it again in the future and meanwhile wish you the very best. I’ll see you at the tournaments.

item.title: By: frandibar
item.dc:creator: frandibar
item.description: Good luck Ben! It's been a a great pleasure!
item.content:encoded: Good luck Ben! It’s been a a great pleasure!
